text: I can already program in other programming/script languages (C/C++, C#, VB.NET, javascript, lua, ...) and I want to learn python now to use panda3D.
(I know I can use C++, but I read that python is easier and faster and it will be fun to learn a new language).
The problem is that most of the tutorials I found on the internet are for beginners and it is kind of boring to read them because I already know how a if, while, variables, ... work.
The only thing I want to learn is how the language looks like.
How to define variables, how to define a class, how to initialize, how to use a library, ...
